overview: How could the UK possibly vote for Brexit? In the small seaside town of Clacton-on-Sea, barber Susan & her clients reflect on current political events, including migration, religious extremism, economic decline & the position of the UK vis-aÌ€- vis the EU. As her barbershop serves as the local gathering place, we get an unfiltered glimpse of the opinions of ordinary people & their hopes for a post-Brexit society.
title: Barber Shop: Clacton-on-Sea
